translations: n.垃圾，废弃物；毫无价值的东西，劣质产品；废话，瞎说
v.<英，非正式>严厉批评，把……说得一无是处
adj.<英，非正式>很差劲的，无用的

sentences.sentence: If you are brave enough to swear those rubbishes in Chinese, I'll say you are the highest IQ man!
sentences.translation: 如果你足够勇敢到用中文骂那些垃圾，我会说你是智商最高的人！

sentences.sentence: First guest of "Therefore I Travel" series will be Xiao Biar , who used rubbishes collected from old Hu Tong to decorate a most well-known travelers' base-Pass By Bar.
sentences.translation: “因此，我们旅行”第一期嘉宾小辫儿，在胡同里东窜西钻，用捡来的破烂搭出了一个享誉京城的酒吧“过客”；

sentences.sentence: Space debris are space rubbishes which were abandoned by human satellite in outer space. Environmental pollution by space debris is a special kind of environmental pollution.
sentences.translation: 空间碎片是人类发射空间实体在外空留下的太空垃圾，其造成空间环境污染是一特殊种类的环境污染问题。
